feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
